## isArray() function

Returns true if `a` is an Array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isArray: <T>(input: T) => input is Extract<T, unknown[] | readonly unknown[]>
```

## Example

```ts
isArray([1, 2, 3]); // true
isArray(2); // false
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/isArray.ts)
